name: Comprehensive Deontic Rules & Permissions
description: Tests PERMITS, PROHIBITS, REQUIRES, OBLIGATES for regulatory and policy reasoning

theory.natural_language: In drone regulations: Medical drones are permitted to fly over hospitals. Commercial drones are prohibited from flying in city centers. All drones require registration. Emergency drones are permitted everywhere. Regular drones can only fly in rural areas. In workplace: Employees are required to wear safety equipment in the factory. Managers are permitted to access confidential files. Interns are prohibited from accessing confidential files. All employees must complete safety training. In finance: Transactions over 10000 dollars require approval. International transfers require compliance check. Cash withdrawals over 5000 require ID verification. Customers are permitted to view their own accounts. In healthcare: Doctors are permitted to prescribe medication. Nurses are permitted to administer prescribed medication. Only doctors can prescribe controlled substances. Patients are required to give consent for treatment. Medical records require patient authorization to share.

queries.natural_language: Can a medical drone fly over a hospital?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes, medical drones are permitted to fly over hospitals.

queries.natural_language: Is a commercial drone allowed in the city center?

expected_answer.natural_language: No, commercial drones are prohibited from city centers.

queries.natural_language: Can an intern access confidential files?

expected_answer.natural_language: No, interns are prohibited from accessing confidential files.

queries.natural_language: Can a manager access confidential files?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes, managers are permitted to access confidential files.

queries.natural_language: Does an international transfer require a compliance check?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes, international transfers require a compliance check.
